/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC -O3 -DNDEBUG  -shared -Wl,-soname,libavidvpiwrapper.so -o libavidvpiwrapper.so CMakeFiles/avidvpiwrapper.dir/avidvpiwrapper.cpp.o   -L/opt/nvidia/deepstream/deepstream/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/nvidia/vpi1/lib64:/opt/nvidia/deepstream/deepstream/lib: -lnvbufsurface -lnvbufsurftransform -lnvdsgst_helper -lnvdsgst_meta -lnvds_meta -lnvds_infer -L/usr/local/cuda-11.4//targets/x86_64-linux/lib -lcudart /opt/nvidia/vpi1/lib64/libnvvpi.so.1.2.3
